text: Chungbuk National Law School is one of the professional graduate schools of Chungbuk National University, located in Cheongju, South Korea. Founded in 2009, it is one of the founding law schools in South Korea and is one of the medium-sized schools with each class in the three-year J.D. program having approximately 70 students. == Programs== Chungbuk Law specializes in Science and Technology law. == References == == Website == * Official Website Category:Law schools in South Korea ko:충북대학교 법학전문대학원
title: Chungbuk National University Law School
